Class ProcedureStoreBase

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure2.store.ProcedureStoreBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProcedureStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
NoopProcedureStore, RegionProcedureStore, WALProcedureStore
@Private public abstract class ProcedureStoreBase extends Object implements ProcedureStore
Base class for ProcedureStores.
